title: Platt Park 1br + Office, Garden Lvl–near Sushi Den, Lt Rail, Wash Park
posting_body: ['Modern Platt Park 1 Bedroom in Perfect Location!', 'S. Grant, Denver, CO 80210', '$1,600/mo', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Sq Footage:', '1,000 sqft.', 'Bedrooms:', '1 Bedroom + Bonus Office', 'Bathrooms:', '1 Bath', 'Parking:', '2', 'Lease Duration:', '1 Year (See Details Below)', 'Deposit:', '$1,600', 'Pets Policy:', 'Will accept one cat; no dogs due to allergies', 'Other Policies:', 'No smoking (420 friendly though); must honor quiet hours and be clean', 'Laundry:', 'In Unit', 'Property Type:', 'Large Victorian House split into two units', 'DESCRIPTION', 'A treasure among Platt Park . . .', 'located just blocks from Old South Pearl Shops, Restaurants, 2 parks (Wash Park/Platt Park), 2 yoga studios and light rail.', 'This garden level unit features windows above ground, charming architecture, an amazing manicured yard, built-ins and spacious kitchen.', ' This property also has a separate upper level rental.', ' Shared spaces are back yard and shed.', 'RENTAL FEATURES', 'Modern updates throughout', 'Appliances include dishwasher & microwave', 'Updated windows', 'Modern lighting', 'Glass block', 'Bonus office/extra closet room', 'Built-in shelves', 'Rounded wall architecture', 'Refrigerator', 'Dishwasher', 'Microwave', 'W/D', 'Spacious and peaceful back yard incl.', 'deck and beautiful native xeric landscaping(shared)', 'Vegetable Garden area', 'Storage space for bikes/skiis', 'Street parking', 'Quiet', 'Well maintained', 'This level is well insulated so stays cool in summer and warm in winter; no a/c needed', 'Upstairs tenants are young professionals, respectful & friendly.', ' You will have your own private space but are welcome to get to know the upstairs tenants', 'LEASE/Move-in TERMS', '** 12 months Lease; shorter is possible but would be more rent', '**', 'First full month’s rent required to move in', '** $1,600 Security Deposit', '**', 'Available September 1', '**', 'Max 2 Tenants', '** Tenant shares utilities with upper level tenants', '**', 'Applicants must pass background, credit (fee is $40) and', 'reference check']
